abstract: Nancy G Brinker, head of breast cancer foundation Susan G Komen for the Cure, has used pink theme to turn breast cancer awareness into multi-billion dollar industry with ties to hundreds of for-profit brands including National Football League; while foundation has raised millions for breast cancer charities, some critics say Brinker has sugarcoated disease.
snippet: A marketing powerhouse has arisen in the war on breast cancer — and, like it or not, it is shaping the national conversation about the disease.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure

lead_paragraph: A marketing powerhouse has arisen in the war on breast cancer — and, like it or not, it is shaping the national conversation about the disease.

headline.main: Welcome, Fans, to the Pinking of America
headline.print_headline: Welcome, Fans, to the Pinking of America
headline.seo: In the Breast Cancer Fight, the Pinking of America
